text: Athanasios "Sakis" Boulas (; 25 September 1954 â€“ 21 February 2014) was a Greek singer, songwriter and actor. He made several studio albums and wrote songs for other musicians. He starred in several television shows and movies. His career has lasted for over 35 years. His career began in 1979. Boulas was born in Kilkis, Greece on 25 September 1954. He was raised in Piraeus. Boulas died of cancer in Athens, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Greece Category:Greek actors Category:Greek singers Category:Singer-songwriters
title: Sakis Boulas
